title: Solar Panel Warranty
content:
WARRANTY COVERAGE

All our solar panel installations come with comprehensive warranty coverage:

PANELS: 25-year product and performance warranty
- Guaranteed 80% output at 25 years
- Covers manufacturing defects
- Covers degradation above normal levels

INVERTERS: 10-year warranty (extendable to 25 years)
- Covers mechanical and electrical faults
- Replacement or repair at our discretion

BATTERY SYSTEMS: 10-year warranty
- Tesla Powerwall: 10 years unlimited cycles
- GivEnergy: 10 years / 6,000 cycles
- FoxESS: 10 years

WORKMANSHIP: 5-year warranty
- Covers installation-related issues
- Roof penetrations and sealing
- Electrical connections

To make a warranty claim, email warranty@solarbright.co.uk with your installation date and system details.

title: Installation Process
content:
INSTALLATION PROCESS

1. FREE SURVEY (1-2 hours)
Our surveyor visits your property to assess roof condition, orientation, and shading. We check structural integrity and discuss your energy needs.

2. SYSTEM DESIGN (2-3 days)
Our engineers design a custom system based on survey findings. You'll receive a detailed proposal with panel placement and expected output.

3. PLANNING & PERMISSIONS (1-2 weeks)
We handle all paperwork including:
- Planning permission (if required)
- Building regulations notification
- DNO (Distribution Network Operator) application
- Grid connection application

4. INSTALLATION (1-2 days)
MCS-certified engineers install your system:
- Day 1: Panel and inverter installation
- Day 2: Electrical connections and testing
- Battery installation (if applicable) on separate half-day

5. COMMISSIONING & HANDOVER (2-3 hours)
We test the system, connect it to the internet for monitoring, and walk you through operation. You receive all documentation and warranties.

6. GRID CONNECTION (2-4 weeks)
Your energy supplier installs a bi-directional meter. Once connected, you can start generating and exporting.

title: Returns & Cancellations
content:
RETURNS & CANCELLATIONS

COOLING OFF PERIOD
You have 14 days from signing your installation contract to cancel without penalty. Simply email cancellation@solarbright.co.uk or call 0800 123 4567.

AFTER INSTALLATION
Due to the custom nature of solar installations, we cannot offer refunds once installation is complete. However, we will work to resolve any issues under our warranty terms.

FAULTY EQUIPMENT
If any equipment is found to be faulty within the warranty period, we will repair or replace at no cost. This does not affect your statutory rights.

DISSATISFACTION
If you're unhappy with any aspect of our service, please contact us directly. We're committed to resolving any concerns and maintaining our 98% customer satisfaction rating.

title: Maintenance & Servicing
content:
MAINTENANCE & SERVICING

ANNUAL SERVICING (OPTIONAL - £99/year)
Our annual service includes:
- Visual inspection of all panels
- Electrical system testing
- Inverter performance check
- Monitoring system verification
- Cleaning (if needed)
- Service report

WARRANTY-BACKED MAINTENANCE
Regular servicing is required to maintain warranty validity. We'll remind you when service is due.

PANEL CLEANING
Panels typically self-clean in rain, but annual cleaning is recommended for optimal performance. We offer cleaning from £49.

MONITORING
All systems include free monitoring via app. You'll receive alerts if system performance drops.

EMERGENCY SUPPORT
24/7 emergency helpline for system faults. Response within 24 hours for non-emergencies.

title: Government Grants & Incentives
content:
GRANTS & INCENTIVES

SMART EXPORT GUARANTEE (SEG)
The SEG requires energy suppliers to offer payment for excess solar energy exported to the grid. Rates vary by supplier but typically 3-10p/kWh. We can help you switch to the best SEG provider.

ECO4 SCHEME
The Energy Company Obligation (ECO4) provides grants for energy efficiency improvements. Eligibility based on:
- Income and benefits
- EPC rating of your property
- Existing heating system

SolarBright is an approved ECO4 installer. We can check your eligibility at no obligation.

BOILER UPGRADE SCHEME
While primarily for heat pumps, this government scheme can sometimes support solar with heat pump combinations.

GRANT SCAM WARNING
We will NEVER charge upfront for grant applications or guarantee grant approval. Beware of cold callers offering 'free solar' - if it sounds too good to be true, it probably is.
